Wizard Assistant Toka:
Hello! I am Toka, Arbana disciple
I study support magic that effects special zones. I came here togheter with Arbana, who is in charge of the Training Zone.
I use support magic that enhances attack skills.
This magic is not applied to the single Adventurer, but to the entire area.
Choose the buff you need, and i will apply it to the zone of your training. I will need some time to apply the buff to the entire area.
What type of attack do you need?
